name: The Others: LOADING
description:
The Others : LOADING is a little project made in 48h for the Area Of Effect Game Jam 2021.

The objective is simple : You have to help professor Zen to do his researches on the computer of his lab, to be able to prove the existence of ALIENS ! But watchout, they won't let it happen that easily...

USE the directionnal arrows to move arround, and E to interact with objects.

The lab need maintenance ! Be sure to fill up the generator, put some paper in the printer, and put a quick punch in the oscilloscope to make it work again !

A game made by Clément DROUET & Camille FOURCADE.
